text: قالوا۟ انا ارسلنا الى قوم مجرمين

translations.translation: They said, 'We have been sent to a people who are evildoers -
We have been sent," they said, "to (punish) a sinful people,
They said: "Verily we have been sent to a guilty people
They said, "We are sent to a sinful people.
They said, “We have been sent towards a guilty nation.”
They said: "We have been sent to a guilty people."
They said: Surely we are sent towards a guilty people,
They said, 'We have been sent unto a people of sinners,
They said: We have been sent unto a guilty folk,
They said, "We have been sent forth to a guilty people."
They said: verily we have been sent unto a people guilty-
They said, ‘We have been sent toward a guilty people,
They said: "We have been sent to a people (deep) in sin,
They (the angels) said: "We have been sent to a people who are Mujrimun (criminals, disbelievers, polytheists, sinners).
They replied: 'We are sent to sinful nation.
They said, “We were sent to a sinful people.”
They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals,
[15:58] They said, ‘We have been sent to a sinning folk, a disbelieving [folk], namely, the people of Lot, in order to destroy them;
(They said: We have been sent unto a guilty folk) to idolaters who brought destruction upon themselves because of their evil acts, meaning here the people of Lot.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { قَالُواْ إِنَّآ أُرْسِلْنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍ مُّجْرِمِينَ } [الحجر: 58] خارجين عن مقتضى العقل والشرع والطبع؛ إذ فعلتهم الفاحشة الشنيعة مما يستقبحه ويستكرهه العقول والطباع مطلقاً، فكيف الشرع، فنلهكهم اليوم بالمرة على مقتضى أمر الله وقدره
